author: dug
msg: Add a list option to admin.

author: gdaniels
msg: Oops - had two 'p' options (password and port).  Change password to
be "-w", to match the stock sample README.  We should put a usage
message in the code at some point, too....

author: gdaniels
msg: If there's already a response message in the MessageContext, use
that instead of making a new one.  This allows Handlers to build up
pieces of the response and have them all combined nicely.
